attributes.action: make Kate Bush [the singer] a Dame
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we believe that kate bush should be recognised for her contribution to quality music. her creativity has not been stifled by pop trends and music's general descent into crassness. she is an inspiration to musicians and public alike.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
